mapper.insert: insert into message_queue_log (id, reference_id, reference_type, exchange_name, routing_key, message, confirm_time, consume_num, fail_cause, status, is_pushed, is_fail_notify, is_deleted, tenant_id, app_id, crt_user, crt_time, upd_user, upd_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routingKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{consumeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPushed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFailNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select id, reference_id, reference_type, exchange_name, routing_key, message, confirm_time, consume_num, fail_cause, status, is_pushed, is_fail_notify, is_deleted, tenant_id, app_id, crt_user, crt_time, upd_user, upd_date from message_queue_log
